1.4.1.name: wordpress/smart-links-by-allembru
1.4.1.description: Dynamically link keywords within your posts! Simply enter the keyword(s) you would like to add a link to, enter the URL to be linked to, give your link a title, and finally select whether you would like your link to open in a new window or the current window. Smart Links by Allembru will scan your posts for that word and dynamically insert the assigned link.
